physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Anorexia, constipation, depressed mood, hair loss.
Somnolent but arousable, trace erythema over inferior sternal incision, healing laceration over right parietal scalp, minimal crackles in lung fields, diffuse muscle wasting.
Electrocardiogram showed sinus rhythm decreased to 44 bpm at admission, new nonspecific T-wave abnormalities appeared compared to previous study.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Pulse decreased from 64 bpm to 43 bpm; new T-wave abnormalities appeared.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Ultrasonography of transplanted kidney showed resistive indexes of arcuate arteries increased to 0.84 to 1.00 at admission.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Resistive indexes increased from 0.74-0.83 to 0.84-1.00, indicating possible transplant rejection.
